meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a meme.
meanings.sent1: The internet is full of memetic jokes that spread quickly.
meanings.sent2: The memetic nature of viral videos makes them popular among users.
meanings.sent3: The memetic cat video made everyone laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were so memetic, they were imitated by everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The memetic catchphrase became ingrained in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the transmission of cultural elements from one individual to another through imitation.
meanings.sent1: The memetic behavior of copying trends is common among teenagers.
meanings.sent2: The memetic spread of fashion trends can be seen across different regions.
meanings.sent3: The memetic exchange of recipes at the potluck was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His memetic way of storytelling made the listeners feel like they were part of the tale.
meanings.sent5: The memetic tradition of passing down stories kept the culture alive.
